title: Foundational Course for Teacher Professional Development Utilizing Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory understanding and ICT (Information and Communication Technology) utilization skills
context.additional_context: Helps pre-service teachers and education majors acquire effective teacher professional development strategies in blended learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of blended learning-based teacher professional development programs.
Learners can apply instructional-learning theories when designing teacher training activities using ICT tools.
Learners can propose blended learning strategies to enhance educational sustainability and equity.
Learners can establish effective Backward Teacher Professional Development (BTPD) implementation plans under a collaborative organizational structure.
Learners can develop assessment tools to analyze the effectiveness of teacher professional development in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
